strategy.title: Strategy Consulting
painPoints: Unclear priorities — Too many initiatives, limited focus
Slow decision-making — Analysis paralysis or reactive firefighting
Execution gaps — Great plans that never fully land
deliverables: Strategic plan with clear objectives and KPIs
Portfolio prioritization and resource allocation framework

operations.title: Operations Consulting
operations.tagline: Streamline processes. Reduce waste. Improve performance.
painPoints: Inefficient processes — Red tape, rework, and bottlenecks
Rising costs — Operational spend growing faster than revenue
Quality issues — Defects, delays, and customer complaints
deliverables: Process maps and value stream analysis
Target operating model and improvement roadmap

transformation.title: Transformation Consulting
transformation.tagline: Navigate change. Embed new ways of working.
painPoints: Resistance to change — People clinging to old ways
Scope creep — Projects that grow beyond original intent
Value leakage — Benefits that don't materialize post-go-live
deliverables: Change impact assessment and stakeholder map
Integration playbook (for M&A) or transformation roadmap

people.title: People & Organization Consulting
people.tagline: Build capability. Strengthen culture. Unlock potential.
painPoints: Leadership gaps — Key roles without the right capabilities
Misaligned culture — Values on the wall don't match behavior
Talent attrition — Losing your best people to competitors
